name: Fruit Crush - Detective Arthur
description:
Join Detective Arthur to gather up food for energy to retrieve the missing items and blast those cases wide open.
Enjoy this swap to match puzzle game as you make your way up the intriguing map.
This game is filled with cute and unique case items, colourful combos, delicious food but not so fast; can you break through the blockages? and how fast can you reach the highest level? Challenge friends with the Facebook leader board and even though this app is free you can always purchase more exciting combos, interesting secret weapons, coins and lives to make your journey ever so smooth. Ready to go under cover? Aldan, Arthur and Briona are waiting for you, lets go.
